text: Natalia Mardero (Montevideo, 22 September 1975) is a Uruguayan writer and journalist. == Works == * 2001, Posmonauta (ed. Latina; Irrupciones 2010) * 2004, Guía para un universo * 2012, Gato en el ropero y otros haikus * 2014, Cordón Soho * 2019, Escrito en Super 8 ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:People from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan journalists Category:Uruguayan women writers
title: Natalia Mardero
